sentences.english: 'They see them as status symbols, ' Dr. Chen says.
sentences.chinese: 陳煥然稱，啤酒肚被視爲一種地位的象徵。

sentences.english: You look really buff and no more beer belly.
sentences.chinese: 你看起來真的強壯了，而且沒有啤酒肚。

sentences.english: Most people who do exercise to lose their beer belly usually only work on belly exercises.
sentences.chinese: 很多靠運動來甩掉啤酒肚的人通常只做腹部運動。

sentences.english: But the producers opted to ignore his beer paunch and the part was his.
sentences.chinese: 但是製作人選擇忽略他的啤酒肚並且角色是他的。

sentences.english: Sometimes drink too much beer would make the beer belly.
sentences.chinese: 有時喝太多啤酒會造成啤酒肚。

sentences.english: I am a 43 year old man with a beer belly.
sentences.chinese: 我是個43歲的純爺們，有個啤酒肚。

sentences.english: Eg:You can see his beer belly through his sweater.
sentences.chinese: 你可以透過他大毛儀，看到他的啤酒肚。

sentences.english: He has a large belly now.
Sometimes drinking too much beer can cause beer-belly.
sentences.chinese: 有時喝太多啤酒會造成啤酒肚。

sentences.english: Not one man in a beer commercial has a beer belly.
sentences.chinese: 啤酒廣告裏的男人都是沒有啤酒肚的。

sentences.english: He was short and fat, with a large beer belly.
sentences.chinese: 他又矮又胖，挺着個大啤酒肚。

sentences.english: Where did you get that beer belly?
Could a beer gut lead to health problems?
sentences.chinese: 啤酒肚會導致健康問題嗎？

sentences.english: Your potbelly is getting a little smaller, too.
sentences.chinese: 你的啤酒肚也比較小了。

sentences.english: I really ought to start doing something. I'm starting to get potbelly .
sentences.chinese: 真的該做些運動了，我都開始長啤酒肚了。

sentences.english: B---I really ought to start doing something . I'm starting to get a potbelly .
sentences.chinese: 真的該做些運動了，我都開始長啤酒肚了。

definition: to put on weight/to get fat (a sign of prosperity, so a compliment)
to put on weight/to get fat
beard/mustache or whiskers/facial hair/CL:撮[zuo3],根[gen1]/(coll.) bandit
back of a tiger and waist of a bear/tough and stocky build
